title: Find a New Supplier for a Product
description: A current supplier is being discontinued. A procurement manager needs to find a new, alternative supplier for a key product.

tasks.description: Search a supplier database for companies that manufacture the required product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds three potential new suppliers.

tasks.description: Request quotes and product samples from the potential suppliers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent contacts the suppliers to gather more information.

tasks.description: Evaluate the quotes and samples to select the best new supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects a new supplier based on price and quality.

tasks.description: Onboard the chosen company as a new supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the new supplier in the system.
